GENERAL BUYERS SUPPLIERS
GENERAL

What is Enernovo?

Enernovo is a materials sourcing platform that professionally connect the buyers and suppliers for safe and efficient jobs.

Which suppliers are on Enernovo?

We audit each supplier, only the qualified can be listed, which is outstanding in the industry and deemed reliable to work with.Nevertheless, Enernovo is exempt from any buying/selling business dispute that Enernovo is not directly involved in.

How can I join Enernovo?

As an outstanding supplier you should meet all the membership criteria and apply to Enernovo.com, we will audit and give you the feedback.

Can I see who I’m quoting against?

No - We keep all quoting information between the respective parties confidential to uphold the integrity and professionalism of customers.

BUYERS

Do I place PO (purchase order) directly to supplier or to Enernovo?

It’s your discretion to issue the PO to either supplier or Enernovo.

What is Enernovo role if the PO issued to Enernovo?

In this case Enernovo will have a separate agreement with the supplier that you designate to work with, Enernovo will manage the PO implementation including shipment and payment.

What’s the difference to issue PO to supplier or Enernovo?

In the case that PO is issued to Enernovo, Enernovo will take over the business responsibility, and will apply the Purchase Protection and PO Management Measures to ensure the quality and delivery.

What is the PO Management Measures?

PO Management Measures includes plant Quality Assurance review, production inspection, random sample Quality Control, a third party examination if necessary, pre-shipment sample, etc.

Is there a fee or price markup to issue PO to Enernovo?

No – The price is out of supplier, Enernovo will have not any price markup.

How does Enernovo make money?

Enernovo makes money by providing buyers and suppliers with a full suite of subcontracting, logistics, insurance and financing services. Enernovo utilizes its expertise and professionalism to offer these services more effectively and value-added.

SUPPLIERS

Can I communicate with the buyer I am quoting to?

For the duration of the quoting process, suppliers are allowed to communicate directly with the buyer. However, it’s the buyer’s discretion whether to communicate directly with the supplier.

How much does it cost to sell product thru Enernovo?

Service charge depends on what kind of service Enernovo offers. There is not any cost if Enernovo is not involved in the business of PO communication.
